LanguageData.HAR_NM_HArmor.label: Light Helm (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_HArmor.description: Nearmare combat headpiece. Provides more defense than the design would imply due to a special protective coating.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_MCt.label: Maid Hairband (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_MCt.description: A maid hairband for Nearmare. For some reason, it make them more efficient.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_MHK.label: Floral Accessory (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_MHK.description: A colorful floral accessory for Nearmare.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Cts.label: Hairband (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Cts.description: An ordinary hairband. Doesn't stand out.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_MRbn.label: Ribbon (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_Tar.label: Tiara (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_HCArmor.label: Cursed Helmet (Nearmare)
LanguageData.HAR_NM_HCArmor.description: A helmet that enhances the wearer's senses, allowing for more precise movements.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_AH_f.label: Spiritual Helmet
LanguageData.HAR_NM_AH_f.description: An advanced version of the Night Demon's Cursed Helmet. It is said to originate from the time of the Creator.
LanguageData.HAR_NM_AH_g.label: Laila Wimple
LanguageData.HAR_NM_AH_g.description: Resembles a wimple worn by Nearmare of the Church of Areteia. It increases movement speed by using the telekinetic powers of the Nearmare.
